title: -- Needing 15 1909 Obaks to finish off my set --
author: shammus

posts.post_title: -- Needing 15 1909 Obaks to finish off my set --
posts.post_content:
Will pay well for any of the above.  Preferably lowgrade ...trimmed cards and beaters are welcome.

Thanks much!
Brian

Here's the complete, up-to-date list of 09 Obaks (18 in all) that I'm needing to finish off this set.  Thanks to anyone that can help!!

Bernard, Berry, Brackenridge, Brashear, Breen, Byrnes, Delmas, Gandil, C. Lewis, D. Lewis, Mundorff, Nagle, Ornsdorff, Reidy, Ryan, Stovall, Wiggs, Willett, 

Brian

Down to just needing 16 cards now. Thanks to anyone that can help!!

Bernard, Berry, Brackenridge, Brashear, Breen, Delmas, Gandil, D. Lewis, Mundorff, Nagle, Ornsdorff, Reidy, Ryan, Stovall, Wiggs, Willett,
